content:
issues i discovered during the usage of Trifolia on FHIR with the IG Publisher:

  • Trifolia sets the ID of a profile to numeric value (probably the ID given by the backend hapi), whereas the IG Publisher expects the ID to be the same as the last part of the url
• only the dev version of trifolia on FHIR works atm: https://trifolia-fhir-dev.lantanagroup.com/
• is there a way to find all resources edited by me/or another user?
• setting the context of an Extension is a very manual process at the moment, would be nice to have some UI guidance like dropdown boxes
• i haven't found a way to add an Extension to a simple DataElement in a StructureDefinition

"is there a way to find all resources edited by me/or another user?"
No. We intend to add auditing at some point, but haven't yet.

"setting the context of an Extension is a very manual process at the moment, would be nice to have some UI guidance like dropdown boxes" I agree. Have you submitted a feature request for this, yet? If so, I'll move it onto our backlog...

"i haven't found a way to add an Extension to a simple DataElement in a StructureDefinition"
Do you have a profile that you're referring to? Could use a reference to the "DataElement" that you're referring to...
